law.text:
The written statement required by § 14-1702 of this subtitle shall disclose to the applicant:
The applicant's right to a statement of reasons within 30 days after receipt by the lender or credit grantor of a request made within 60 days after notification, made under § 14-1702(a) of this subtitle;
The identity of the person or office from which the statement of reasons may be obtained; and
The right of the applicant to have the statement of reasons confirmed in writing on written request.
